speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: I'll read the objective in the overview for this group.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: The TNB group has been fostering interdisciplinary research and collaboration for decades.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Our mission is to advance the understanding and application of active inference, a theoretical framework developed by Professor Carl Thurston.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: This is achieved through regular online meetings featuring presentations and discussions, which may include theoretical frameworks, empirical data and its analysis, simulations and mathematical development.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: We welcome contributions and perspectives from diverse fields, including neuroscience, mathematics, machine learning, psychology, philosophy, medicine, and biology.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: The TNB for a long time was hosted through the affiliation and professorship of Carl Friston at UCL in London, and now is hosted at the Institute.
